value:
I wonder what kind of country lies
beyond this sea... I would love to see
it with my own eyes some day.

I am not particularly good with lively
places... I'd rather sit at the cove and
listen to the sound of the waves.

This is just between you and me, but
I couldn't even look at Eirika in her
swimsuit. She was just too radiant...

I once read in a book that the ocean
is the origin of all life. This place is
certainly teeming with it.

I walked out on the beach for only a
short while, but...apparently, I burn
quite easily.

I am Lyon, prince of Grado. I've been
entrusted with delivering a tropical
gift by $Nf.

Ephraim, Eirika... It looks like even I
know how to enjoy the summer.

I wasn't sure I'd be able to handle it,
but it seems I've gotten used to the
heat. Thank goodness.

I... I think I had a little too much sun...
Please forgive me...

Thank you, this is perfect for passing
the time on a tropical island. I will
treasure it.

I am Lyon, prince of Grado. I am not
accustomed to having fun on the
beach, but I will do my best.

I spend most of my time in my room
reading books, so I was nervous
about coming to a tropical island.$k$pBut even here, there has been so
much to learn—why, just look at all
these unusual fruits and colorful fish.$k$pI have discovered so much here,
under this boundless blue sky.$k$pI will need to express my gratitude to
Eirika for inviting me. And of course
to you, $Nu.$k$pNo matter what fate awaits me, I will
never forget this summer.$k$pThese days, glittering like jewels...
I am certain they will always shine
within my heart.
Wonderful weather.
Swimming is not for me.
Look—a fish!
Ephraim, you'll be proud!
I need...a break...
ふふっ
Good to meet you—I'm Lyon. Is the ocean view always so breathtaking here?
Oh! That looks refreshing. Some kind of warm-weather treat, I take it?
I only now saw Eirika. She was running full speed toward the ocean with a huge smile on her face.
Ephraim outpaces me in swimming as easily as he does in sparring.
What a strange little sea creature. It's rather cute, if prickly. Wouldn't you say?
Watching everyone enjoying themselves by the seaside, I feel as though I've strayed into a dream...
What do you say to a stroll along the beach at sunset? I think it would be lovely.
A scorching day.
Over there?
The sea calls.
